.. agentic-crew documentation master file

=======================================
agentic-crew Documentation
=======================================

**Framework-agnostic AI crew orchestration** - declare once, run on CrewAI, LangGraph, or Strands.

Why agentic-crew?
=================

The AI agent ecosystem is fragmented. agentic-crew solves this with a **universal crew format** that decomposes to any framework:

- **CrewAI** - Full-featured, best for complex crews
- **LangGraph** - Great for flow-based logic
- **Strands** - Lightweight, AWS-native

Define your crews once in YAML, run them anywhere.

Quick Example
=============

.. code-block:: python

   from agentic_crew import run_crew

   # Auto-detects best available framework
   result = run_crew(
       "my-package",
       "analyzer",
       inputs={"code": "..."}
   )
